document.full_text: memphis grizzlies forward rudy gay has been ruled out for the rest of the season after having surgery on friday to repair a partial dislocation of his left shoulder, the team said.
document.title: grizzlies forward rudy gay out for season after shoulder surgery
lines_and_colors: memphis grizzlies forward rudy gay has been ruled out for the rest of the season after having surgery on friday to repair a partial dislocation of his left shoulder, the team said.
